name: Advancing T2 Practicing Pack
description: An advancing T2 Practicing Pack given by Adventure Association (can used by advanced T2 players and above). Open the pack to receive JOB EXP Potion (L) x5, BASE EXP Potion (L) x5, Valkyrie's Gift x2, Belief Token x30, Gold Medal x3, Eden Coin x500.
